channel.title: water on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in water on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-16
item.description: Reddit files to take the company public (1 minute read) Reddit has started the process of going public by filing a confidential S-1 with the Securities and Exchange Commission.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-03
item.description: Google Tensor debuts on the new Pixel 6 this fall (3 minute read) Tensor is Google’s first custom-built System on a Chip specifically for Pixel phones.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-28
item.description: Tencent’s WeChat suspends new user registration in China to comply with ‘relevant laws and regulations’ (2 minute read) WeChat has temporarily suspended registrations for new users in China while it upgrades its security technology to align with all relevant laws and regulations.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-27
item.description: Facebook unveils free-to-play cloud gaming service (7 minute read) Facebook Gaming has been launched in beta for a limited group of people.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-10
item.description: Spotify are reportedly working on a new karaoke feature (1 minute read) Spotify is working on a Karaoke Mode that will feature lyrics and adjustable vocal levels for songs.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-15
item.description: Amazon’s new smart shopping cart lets you check out without a cashier (4 minute read) Amazon has a new smart grocery store cart that is equipped with a touchscreen and other hardware to automatically detect what items are being placed inside it.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-14
item.description: Google just put a photo of the Pixel 4A on its store (1 minute read) An image of Google’s Pixel 4A was mistakenly published on its Canadian store.
